CHAT.comment: C & L ENTERPRISES, INC., Petitioners v. CITIZEN BAND POTAWATOMI INDIAN TRIBE OF OKLAHOMA.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN DAVID MASHBURN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GREGORY S. COLEMAN ON BEHALF OF TEXAS, AS AMICUS CURIAE SUPPORTING PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL MINNIS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MR. GARRE ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN DAVID MASHBURN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:58 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
